sentences.en: Even take the word burgher or bourgeois.
sentences.cn: 比如说"市民"或称之为"布尔乔亚"

sentences.en: Seller unagree to allowance over 30 c burgher push undesirable.
sentences.cn: 卖方拒绝赔偿30美分以上,再勉强也无用.

sentences.en: The market square, flanked by the colourful gables of burgher houses, is probably the definitive site of the area.
sentences.cn: 集市广场的两侧是色彩鲜艳的尖顶民居，这里应该是老城区的中心地带了。

sentences.en: The pop festival have shocked the good burgher of canterbury.
sentences.cn: 流行歌曲音乐汇演震动了坎特伯雷有头有脸的市民.

words.tran_cn: （英）自由民；市民；议员；（美）镇行政官
市民（现主要指某些欧洲国家中产阶级的市民或镇民）；公民

trans.tran_cn: 公民，市民（现主要指某些欧洲国家中产阶级的市民或镇民）
trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a particular town
